mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_resume_education (resume_no, resume_education_gbn_code, resume_education_name, resume_education_major, resume_education_score, resume_education_indt, resume_education_outdt, resume_education_transfer_yn) VALUES (#{resumeNo}, #{resumeEducationGbnCode}, #{resumeEducationName}, #{resumeEducationMajor}, #{resumeEducationScore}, #{resumeEducationIndt}, #{resumeEducationOutdt}, #{resumeEducationTransferYn})
